about.title: About Camping Loutsa
about.description: Camping Loutsa is a family-run campsite situated west of the village of Finikounda, opposite the beautiful Messinian Oinousses islands. With separate plots, a mini market, traditional Greek food, and modern facilities, we offer a unique blend of comfort and authentic Greek hospitality.
about.mission_text: To provide a warm and friendly atmosphere where families and travelers can experience authentic Greek culture while enjoying modern amenities and spectacular natural surroundings.

rules.title: Campsite Rules & Regulations
rules.quiet_hours_desc: Keep noise to a minimum after 10 PM to respect other guests.
rules.pets_desc: Pets allowed with proper documentation and vaccination records.
rules.campfires_desc: Campfires permitted only in designated areas. Follow all fire safety guidelines.
rules.parking_desc: Park only in designated parking areas. Do not block roads or other sites.
rules.waste_desc: Dispose of waste in designated bins. Keep your site clean.
rules.safety_desc: Follow all safety guidelines and emergency procedures.
rules.respect_desc: Respect other guests and the natural environment.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faq.a1: Check-in is at 2 PM and check-out is at 11 AM. Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request.
faq.a2: Yes, a refundable deposit is required to secure your reservation.
faq.a3: Yes, pets are allowed with proper documentation and vaccination records.
faq.a4: Breakfast is not included, but we have a mini market with supplies. Our restaurant also serves breakfast.
faq.q5: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a5: We accept cards and cash. Card payments receive a 2% discount.
faq.a6: Campfires are permitted only in designated areas. Please follow all fire safety guidelines.
